description: This Java source file defines the JobStore class, which manages in-memory storage of job objects related to a wikitoneo4j backend, allowing creation, status updates, error reporting, and retrieval of jobs.

classes.name: JobStore
classes.description: A service component that provides thread-safe in-memory storage and management of job status and results.

methods.name: createJob
methods.description: Creates a new job with status 'processing', stores it, and returns its unique ID.

methods.name: completeJob
methods.description: Marks an existing job as 'done' and sets its result.

methods.name: errorJob
methods.description: Marks a job as 'error' with an associated error message.

methods.name: getJob
methods.description: Retrieves a job by its ID.
